import recommend from '../Icons/recommend.svg' import dummy from './comments.json' function Comment() { return (
{dummy.comments.map((comment) =>

{comment.userId}

{comment.mbti}

{comment.time.split(' ')[0]}

{/*
{comment.agree === 'true' ? '찬성' : '반대'}
*/}
{comment.agree}

공감

{comment.likes}

{comment.comment}

alert('추천')}>
)}
) } export default Comment
